channel.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
channel.description:
Whenever typing the word In-fexis it gets "censored" or how I would called to MoparScape. My question is why?
Anyways, since the username In-fexis hasn't been used in several years, I'd like to ask if I could get a name change? I'm the real In-fexis and been a active user since 2008 on the other RSPS community sites, even on here.

item.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Fexis, post:22, topic:428869”][quote author=Tree link=topic=531566.msg3885011#msg3885011 date=1326376594]

[quote author=Fexis link=topic=531566.msg3884997#msg3884997 date=1326375556]

[quote author=Tree link=topic=531566.msg3884994#msg3884994 date=1326375312]

Your name is unknown anyway.
What’s the use?
[/quote]You have nothing to do with it. Most people know me as Infexis, and I’m very known, maybe not here yet since I’ve been unactive, but look at the other RSPS sites.

Unactive? Inactive.
I don’t know you and i’ve been around for yonks. Your name doesn’t matter.
If you contribute and show a good attitude, respect will come anyway. If you worry about names and titles, this forum just becomes a power game.
[/quote]I just tryed to use my original name. However we’ve solved this problem, why keep posting?

Tryed? Tried.
Just to spread my wisdom. Even if it’s unwanted.
Consider it my gift to you.
[/quote]Why do you care so much about spelling? I’m not English nor American, my spelling isn’t perfect of course. Now stop replying…[/quote]

Spellcheck. Problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:

Thanks. The account has been created back in 2009 by me, you can look it up by the ip, and the activity of the account shows that it’s not active at all since of no replies nor anything else.

If you can’t let me use that name otherwise I would like to have In-fexis has my username.

Read full topic

item.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Got a fast reply, your censor was removed. Again, if the name already exists we can’t delete or give you access to someone else’s account.

Read full topic

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:428869”]Date Registered: Today at 08:48:45 AM

Rep: 72

Yeah that seems legit.[/quote]

Implying rep means anything? I had like 80 within my first 4 hours of coming here.

item.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I just posted a question about it, we’ll see if anyone knows. Until then you’ll just have to wait.

Read full topic

item.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:428869”]We don’t have logs of censors or why they are put into place, which we probably should…

But I’m guessing something was released under that name that causes the censor to be put in place.

As for the name change, if there is an account already with that name, it’s taken, and we aren’t going to delete an account for a name change.[/quote]Okay, can you make the word In-fexis showable? And if it’s possible to see if the accounts exists, if so by somehow check if the ip is the same and then change my name? If not by changing my name to In-fexis atleast.

Test: Infexis

Read full topic

item.title: Question to Moderators & Administrators
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We don’t have logs of censors or why they are put into place, which we probably should…

But I’m guessing something was released under that name that causes the censor to be put in place.

As for the name change, if there is an account already with that name, it’s taken, and we aren’t going to delete an account for a name change.

Read full topic
